plot: After losing his job, Homer contemplates ending it all, until he discovers a new life path as a safety advocate.

Bart's class is on a field trip in the nuclear power plant in Springfield, where his father Homer works. When he breaks a pipe in the building, he is fired from his job, making him miserable. Homer is suddenly desperate for money and steals Bart's piggy bank for money, but all there is are a few cents. Homer feels guilty and he has the thought to threaten to kill himself. But Homer's family stops him and they tell him how much they love him.—kevindklenke
